grappelli.dashboard.templatetags package¶

Submodules¶

grappelli.dashboard.templatetags.grp_dashboard_tags module¶

Dashboard template tags, the following dashboard tags are available:
  • {% grp_render_dashboard %}
  • {% grp_render_dashboard_module %}

To load the dashboard tags: {% load grp_dashboard_tags %}.

grappelli.dashboard.templatetags.grp_dashboard_tags.grp_render_dashboard(context, location='index', dashboard=None)[source]¶

Template tag that renders the dashboard, it takes two optional arguments:

location
The location of the dashboard, it can be ‘index’ (for the admin index dashboard) or ‘app_index’ (for the app index dashboard), the default value is ‘index’.
dashboard
An instance of Dashboard, if not given, the dashboard is retrieved with the get_index_dashboard or get_app_index_dashboard functions, depending on the location argument.
grappelli.dashboard.templatetags.grp_dashboard_tags.grp_render_dashboard_module(context, module, index=None, subindex=None)[source]¶

Template tag that renders a given dashboard module, it takes a DashboardModule instance as first parameter and an integer index as second parameter, that is the index of the module in the dashboard.
